name: Get the Coffee
description:
Created for Game Maker's Toolkit  Jam 2018. The Theme was: GENRE, but you can’t MECHANIC. This was our first Jam and Game. We know it is a little buggy. Please give us feedback.

Rules:

Move with A/D or  Left/Right.
Use  Space to Jump. You cant run just Jump.
The Floor is Lava - so keep moving or died.
Help "LittleGuy" to get the coffee.
